div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version 📍 where constraint = ^449080006
Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10 version 📍

description.value: Este ValueSet contiene los códigos de Snomed CT que representan hallazgos clínicos más la CIE 10
